title: Textile, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: crewel wool on cotton
Technique: long and short satin, and stem stitch embroidery on plain weave
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Pieced fragment of sheer white muslin embroidered in small scale scattered designn of garden flowers and butterflies, in polychrome wools. Satin, long and short, stem stitches.

early 19th century. Medium: crewel wool on cotton
